name: nearlib
description: Javascript library to interact with near blockchain

scripts.build: npm run generate-protos && browserify browser-exports.js -i node-fetch -o dist/nearlib.js && browserify browser-exports.js -i node-fetch -g uglifyify -o dist/nearlib.min.js
scripts.doc: documentation readme near.js account.js wallet-account.js signing/key_pair.js -f md --shallow --section=API --readme-file=API.md

author: Evguenia Degtiareva
